data.title: ERP solution for Manufacturing Industry
data.meta_description: Cadran offers a complete ERP solution for Manufacturing Industry. Multi-site, multi-currency and multi-language, on-premise and Cloud ERP solutions.
data.text:
Oracle NetSuite ERP

Oracle NetSuite ERP is a SaaS (Software as a Service) solution with wide-ranging functionality for businesses operating in the Industrial Manufacturing sector. All modules are integrated and all your data is securely stored in a central database in the Cloud. Due to its scalability, NetSuite can be used by multinational manufacturers of all sizes and is easy to implement on account of its available templates for manufacturing and other companies. Since NetSuite is a SaaS solution, you don’t require your own infrastructure and are always up-to-date with the latest releases of the software and technology. NetSuite’s Pay-as-You-Go pricing system allows you to start small and then expand in tandem with your business, making it ideal ERP software for manufacturing companies.

Pay as You Go

Wide-Ranging Functionality

Multi-Site, Multi-Country, and Multi-Language

Integrated Workflow

Role-based Dashboards

Integrated Business Intelligence

Manufacturing Template for Quick Implementation

Mix-Mode Manufacturing (MTS, MTO, and ETO)

Demand and Supply Planning

Inventory Management, WMS, and Scanning

E-Commerce & CRM

Service, Warranty, and Repairs

Implementation

Cadran has been implementing Oracle software since 1998 at companies operating in a variety of sectors within Industry and Wholesale. We work exclusively with senior project managers, consultants and developers, who combine their wide and in-depth knowledge of the various Oracle ERP solutions with a clear understanding of business processes in the wholesale industry. They also come up with innovative solutions that allow you to make the most of your Oracle ERP system, making it easier for you to achieve your business goals and ensuring that your employees will find the software to be user-friendly and versatile. To ensure successful implementation of your new ERP system or any of our other solutions, Cadran and its Redfaire International partners have developed a solid project methodology based on the key principles outlined below.

Accelerate Solutions

We use industry templates containing predefined business processes – based on your industry’s best business practices – including Contract to Cash and Plan to Produce.

Hybrid Implementation Strategy

Our practice of using industry-specific templates and combining these with business-specific configuration is both efficient and cost-effective, while at the same time providing you with a business-specific set-up that provides maximum support for your processes.

Integrated Methodology and Tools

Our methodology features a clear timescale, specific products, and a clear division of duties. This approach is supported by our toolset, which means that up-to-date, transparent details on the costs, scope, risks and progress of the project are available at any time.

Change Management

In any project, change is the only constant, and since we are aware that change can potentially meet with resistance, it is essential to integrate Change Management into the project strategy.

Managed Services & Support

We support your business in running your Oracle ERP system and keep your vital business processes ticking over. Our Support Team provides the following services, which you can implement based on your organization’s needs:

Support Service

Perfect for businesses that lack an in-house IT support team. We provide full technical and functional support based on your needs and requirements and the Oracle ERP system you have chosen.

Additional Support

We can reduce pressure on your internal IT organization, so your team can focus on supporting new initiatives to allow your company to grow. We can take on both technical and functional management, with our team making up an integral part of your organization.

Pay as You Go

We offer a support subscription service, which gives you access to our experienced support team on request. You can choose to either pay a half-hourly rate or open a pre-paid account covering a specific number of support days or hours. Cadran provides you with a single point of contact for all your Oracle ERP support needs. More about Managed Services & Support
